column1: '''Gandalf's Song of Lórien''' was sung by [[Gandalf]] in [[Meduseld]] on [[2 March]] {{TA|3019}}<ref>{{App|Great}}</ref>
column2: as an answer to [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]]'s insulting claim that "webs of deceit were ever woven in [[Dwimordene]]".<ref>{{TT|III6}}</ref>

column1: Seldom have walked the feet of Men
Few mortal eyes have seen the light
Clear is the water of your well;
White is the star in your white hand;
More fair than thoughts of Mortal Men.
